title: how do u get ur replays
body: i just want to know how to receive a replay of my games so i can use them for vids

replies.body: There are several replay programs out there that save the replay on your PC every match, such as lolreplay and skinspotlights, though I personally use [BaronReplays](https://ahri.tw/en/FAQ/). You can also get them from [replay.gg](http://www.replay.gg/) or [op.gg](http://oce.op.gg/).
thx man im really grateful for this help
